result.ga: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig

result.html: An dtig liom labhairt le PádraigMay I speak to Patrick?

result.eng: Can I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ga: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.orig: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat

result.ponchtml: An féidir liom laḃairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.

result.eng: You will have to talk to her again.
result.html: Beidh ort labhairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.ga: Is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.orig: Is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.html: Is breá liom labhairt le daoineI like talking to people.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom laḃairt le daoineI like talking to people.

result.eng: I can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.orig: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.html: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárachI can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom laḃairt leat amáraċI can talk to you tomorrow.

result.eng: I can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.orig: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.html: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthachI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom laḃairt leat tá mé róġnóṫaċI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.

result.eng: This is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ga: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.orig: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.html: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le laḃairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.

result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.

result.eng: I am here to talk to you.
result.ga: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.orig: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.html: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leatI am here to talk to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé anseo ċun laḃairt leatI am here to talk to you.

result.eng: Hello. Can I speak with Seán?

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.html: Is féidir liom Sínis a labhairtI can speak Chinese.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom Sínis a laḃairtI can speak Chinese.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
